Rust Systems Developer

Full-time, remote

We need help from a Junior Rust Systems Developer with the exceptional mindset to extend functionality, documentation and write functional and unit tests of several cross-platform projects, some of which are open-source. It is an advantage if you can read JavaScript/NodeJS code. The job is a long-term opportunity.

Conditions and projections:

  • - Trial month : 750$ / month
  • - Starting salary : 1000$ / month.
  • - Expected salary in a year : 2000$ / month.

Conditions and projections:

  • - The fast growth of knowledge and practical skills.
  • - The rapid growth of salary.
  • - Reliable long-term job.
  • - Planning skills.
  • - Skills on how to be productive.
  • - Small friendly team.
  • - Regular feedback on your work.
  • - My help with learning and advancing in your career.
  • - Gentle introduction to the world of remote work under my guidance.
  • - An opportunity to become part of the global economy and get independence from the local market.
  • - Improve your English.

What I expect from you:

  • - Hardworking.
  • - Transparency.
  • - Full dedication to our projects.
  • - Full-time.
  • - Thirst for knowledge.
  • - Desire to do systems programming and write programs for other software developers.

Requirements for the job:

  • - Strong-enough Rustlang skills.
  • - Ability to read JavaScript/NodeJS code.
  • - Practical skills with git and GitHub.
  • - Confidence with the text editor.
  • - Basic understanding of the theory of algorithms.
  • - English.
  • - Skills to follow conventions.
  • - Skills to learn new things.
  • - Skills to work hard.
  • - Ability to follow TDD.
  • - Critical thinking.
  • - Persistence.
